entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
